means.word_mean: 1. general who commanded the Carthaginian army in the second Punic War; crossed the Alps and defeated the Romans but was recalled to defend Carthage and was defeated (247-182 BC)
2. a town in northeast Missouri on the Mississippi River; boyhood home of Mark Twain
